script: A rubik's cube, a chessboard, and a computer. Curiosity sparked my journey with programming and problem-solving.
description: A cozy bedroom during the day

script: At 13, I began scripting and modding games. Then spent several years teaching myself various programming languages, focusing on web development.
description: A cozy bedroom during the afternoon

script: Eventually, I pursued formal education in Information Technology, studying for two years before transitioning into the professional world.
description: A school front building during the afternoon

script: So far, I've gained two years of professional experience on frontend development, and a year on backend.
Outside of work, I enjoy chess, video games, and writing stories for visual novels and games. These moments are shared with my cats, Loki and Sypha.
description: A cozy living room during the night

script: Looking ahead, I envision a future where I develop games and write stories while maintaining my web development expertise.
description: A cozy bedroom during the night

script: The journey continues, and thank you for stopping by...
